getPhraseText: There are probably plenty of workers out there right now.
We're in the middle of a recession, worried about their jobs.
Who would rather have a part time job with fewer hours than no job at all?
And it was happening pre any changes to the fair work act.

So we've actually got an extraordinary, uh, good system in terms of a combination of protection for workers as well as flexibility that exists in our fair work out well before the changes to do with job caper.
It also exists in many awards and many agreements, and there's a real willingness by working people toe work with the people that they work for their employers to find a way through this.
